model.entities

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.entities.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Camera represents a players current view of the world
    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949, Divya Patel - 300304450

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float CAMERA_OFFSET
